title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install from PyPI as ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; install from npm as ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) providing LLM and embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models; runs in Docker or locally.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; install via gem install ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for querying Ollama models inside the editor with completion and chat splits.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Community-maintained Dart/Flutter package for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming and conversation management; available on NuGet.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to deploy Ollama on AWS ECS with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama models via socket-mode for private and channel conversations.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama 3, Mistral, Phi-3, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async Tokio support; published on crates.io.
